channel.title: About alching
channel.description:
Hi. I were wondering, isnt alching with a script that clicks with coordinates (with random +/- 5coordinates) and random intervals undetectable? Because, well, they shouldnt be able to detect it as it isnt clicking on the same colour each time....? This is the script i usually use:
[code]program New; var i,j,x,y,z :integer; begin
z:= strtoint(Readln('How many left do u got?')) writeln('Press alt+S to start!') repeat if (((IsFunctionKeyDown(5))or(IsFunctionKeyDown(8)))and(iskeydown('s')))then begin writeln('started!') x:= 633+random(5) y:= 306+random(5) for i := 1 to z do begin j:=5
holdmouse(x,y,true) wait(200+random(100)) releasemouse(x,y,true) wait(500+random(300)) wait(2600+random(550)) holdmouse(x,y,true) wait(200+random(100))
releasemouse(x,y,true)
holdmouse(x,y,true) wait(200+random(100))
releasemouse(x,y,true) wait(500+random(300)) wait(2400+random(1000)) holdmouse(x,y,true) wait(200+random(100))
releasemouse(x,y,true)
end; end; wait(10)
until(j=5) end. [/code]
Im just wondering if it would be completely safe to use this to alch like 60k yew longs... I know it doesent have anti randoms, but the randoms doesent come when youre in a bank. Also ill keep an eye out as im close to the computer anyway...

item.title: About alching
item.dc:creator: @z92 z92
item.description:
@z92 wrote:

Woah, i hope someone could do something like that, cause there isnt really any good alching scripts out is there?

Read full topic

item.title: About alching
item.dc:creator: @dead_link dead_link
item.description:
@dead_link wrote:

say the alech spell is present between 300,400 and 600,700 (just assume )
and the yews in notes between 200,300 and 400,500
now u cud have the script go like

yewsaleched:=0
repeat
MouseC ( random(101)+300 , random(101)+600 , 1 )
wait ( random(11)+40 );
MouseC ( random(101)+200, random(101)+400 , 1 )
wait ( random(11)+40 );
yewsaleched:=yewsaleched+1
until ( yewsaleched = goalyews );

i wud have made something like that if i had the time…

and for moving the mouse u cud use something else instead of MouseC
i just used it coz i have been goingg through squig’s include

Read full topic

item.description:
@sdcit wrote:

movemousesmooth but… use SRL and it will be near indetectable

Read full topic

item.title: About alching
item.dc:creator: @z92 z92
item.description:
@z92 wrote:

But, How would they detect it? I mean, the only way would be looking what programs i had running (which is illegal… privacy issues you know.) ???

I just want to be perfectly sure, cause i really hated when i got banned on my main for alching like 700 bows … An older main, that is. i also used some newb program. But still…

Edit: Oh, also… Shouldnt there be some ‘move mouse’ command in there, cause it looks as if it will just jump the mouse instead of moving the mouse?

Read full topic

item.title: About alching
item.dc:creator: @Emp Emp
item.description:
@Emp wrote:

Well yeah, nearly undetectable. But theres always a chance. Just make sure you dont alch them all at once…

Read full topic

item.title: About alching
item.dc:creator: @z92 z92
item.description:
@z92 wrote:

Hi. I were wondering, isnt alching with a script that clicks with coordinates (with random +/- 5coordinates) and random intervals undetectable? Because, well, they shouldnt be able to detect it as it isnt clicking on the same colour each time…?
This is the script i usually use:

[code]program New;
var i,j,x,y,z :integer;
begin

z:= strtoint(Readln(‘How many left do u got?’))
writeln(‘Press alt+S to start!’)
repeat
if (((IsFunctionKeyDown(5))or(IsFunctionKeyDown(8)))and(iskeydown(‘s’)))then
begin
writeln(‘started!’)
x:= 633+random(5)
y:= 306+random(5)
for i := 1 to z do
begin
j:=5

holdmouse(x,y,true)
wait(200+random(100))
releasemouse(x,y,true)
wait(500+random(300))
wait(2600+random(550))
holdmouse(x,y,true)
wait(200+random(100))

releasemouse(x,y,true)

holdmouse(x,y,true)
wait(200+random(100))

releasemouse(x,y,true)
wait(500+random(300))
wait(2400+random(1000))
holdmouse(x,y,true)
wait(200+random(100))

releasemouse(x,y,true)

end;
end;
wait(10)

until(j=5)
end.
[/code]

Im just wondering if it would be completely safe to use this to alch like 60k yew longs… I know it doesent have anti randoms, but the randoms doesent come when youre in a bank. Also ill keep an eye out as im close to the computer anyway…

Read full topic
